CryEngineModule(CrySensorSystem PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryPlugins")

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
PRIVATE 
	"${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryCommon"

endif()
